source_text: In the event a party does not contribute its share of proportional joint venture costs, the participating interest of that party shall be diluted according to an industry standard formula and if a party's interest is diluted to 10% or less, that party's interest shall be automatically converted to a 0.5% net smelter return royalty and the non-diluting party shall have a 100% interest.
additional_details: The royalty is received by the non-diluting party (who will then have 100% interest in the project). It is paid by the party whose participating interest is diluted to 10% or less due to non-contribution of joint venture costs.
